ygData.subject: Re: Re: Lots o Wizard groups
ygData.msgSnippet: Feign death is the reason. Ok here is an example of what makes a monk so great when it comes to pulling. The froglok King room in Lguk. there are 5 very nasty
ygData.messageBody:
Feign death is the reason. Ok here is an example of what makes a monk so
great when it comes to pulling. The froglok King room in Lguk. there are 5
very nasty mobs in the room. There are Bok and Guk Knights/shaman, Jin/kor
Wizzies, the Froglock Tactictian (wizard), not to mention the Froglok King.
the spawn level of these guys is around 45--49. (If anyone has specific
numbers than that let me know.) Using feign death a monk can pull a single
mob at a time out of this room. The very simple fact that a monk can
terminate the pull by doing an FD and not training his team with more
mosters than they can handle make them the best puller.


Kizmet Bayashi
40th level monk
Da`Kor
E-Marr


----- Original Message -----
From: John Callaway <jcallaway@...>
To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 9:20 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: Lots o Wizard groups


> From: "John Callaway" <jcallaway@...>
>
> My question is why is the Monk the best puller available. What is it that
> he can do (and how) that can do this?
>
> Thanks
>
> Genane
> Monk of Cazic Thule
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Tim Perkins <tperkins@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, 8 October 1999 9:19
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re: Lots o Wizard groups
>
>
> > From: "Tim Perkins" <tperkins@...>
> >
> > Ever wonder why parties always want a monk to pull? Because the Monk IS
> the
> > best puler in the game Bar none. When was the last time a ranger was
asked
> > to pull the ghoul lord or froglock king room? Maybe when a monk wasnt
> > available. Noone can split up groups of multiple mobs like a monk. Sure
a
> > ranger can track in a large zone but a Monk can pull outdoors also. when
a
> > Ranger can pull in all environments just as well as a monk then you will
> > have a valid argument.
> >
> > Kizmet Bayashi
> > 40th level monk
> > Da`Kor
> > E-Marr
